thread.title: Miley Cyrus, Flaming Lips planning ‘completely naked show’ with milk
thread.title_full: Miley Cyrus, Flaming Lips planning ‘completely naked show’ with milk | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: Miley Cyrus, Flaming Lips planning ‘completely naked show’ with milk
text:
Other Articles Study sheds light on culinary habits of Stonehenge builders 'Fantasy Island' to get reboot with female protagonist Leonardo DiCaprio to make movie on Volkswagen scandal Miley Cyrus and American rock band The Flaming Lips are planning a nude concert for a music video.
Lead singer Wayne Coyne posted a picture on Instagram of a naked split-shot of the band and Cyrus, captioning “Oh f–k..!!! @mileycyrus is planning a show where her, the band (us) and the audience are all COMPLETELY naked with milk (well white stuff that looks like milk) is being spewed everywhere.. It’s a video (in the works) for #mileycyrusandherdeadpetz song ‘The Milky Milky Milk’..,” E!Online reports
Earlier, the 22-year-old singer revealed that she would be touring with The Flaming Lips in support of her surprise album ‘Miley Cyrus and Her Dead Petz.’
 14, 2015 11:45 pm
